org.atmosphere.plugin.hazelcast

Class HazelcastSerializedBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.cpr.DefaultBroadcaster
      • org.atmosphere.util.AbstractBroadcasterProxy
        • org.atmosphere.plugin.hazelcast.HazelcastBroadcaster
          • org.atmosphere.plugin.hazelcast.HazelcastSerializedBroadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.atmosphere.cpr.Broadcaster

    public class HazelcastSerializedBroadcaster
extends HazelcastBroadcaster
    Simple Broadcaster implementation based on Hazelcast for Serializable objects This broadcaster will publish the object as is to the Hazelcast topic queue and rely on Hazelcast's capability to serialize objects
    Author:
    Ruby Boyarski
